text: Ra yadi allahale manisaharula'i uniharuko acaranako karana samatna thaleko bha'e dharatiko kunai jivadharila'i pani chodane thi'ena. Tara allahale uniharula'i eka niscita samayasam'ma avasara di'eko cha. Ani jaba uniharuko nirdharita samaya a'ipugnecha ta niscaya nai allaha aphna sevakaharula'i herisakne cha
